ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Three: Foreplay/Long Time
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev43 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-19 03:46:28. [Issue ID 404664]
ComicInfo.Characters: Warren Azoff,Old Man,Simon Cooke,Keenan Wade,Dolph Alpha,Shadow Lynx,Cha Cha Alpha
ComicInfo.Tags: Warren Azoff,Annabelle Lagravenese,Larry,Albert Eisenhower,Simon Cooke,Keenan Wade,The Old Man,Cha-Cha],Quinn (flashback),Alpha Brothers [Dolph
ComicInfo.Summary: There are a million stories in Saturn City, and Simon Cooke's is just one of them! His future may be wide open, but the past is hot on his tail! The Old Man can still get it up! No two ways about it -- this is the perfect time to pay for SEX! It's even better than you think!
